text:
S11 • E2 Homewreckers

Shaunie tries to broker peace between Evelyn and Vanessa while in town for an award, and the ladies question Brittany Renner's motives when the blogs report on her dinner with Shaunie's ex.
title: Basketball Wives - TV Series

meta_data.description: Original cast members and newcomers establish alliances and shatter bonds as the women establish their positions in the pecking order, competing to become the real MVP.
